title: Peer Feedback Enhancement Process Using Educational Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic writing skills and feedback provision
context.additional_context: A microlearning course that enhances peer feedback through chatbots in mobile environments. Learners access educational content via personal devices and receive continuous feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ways to improve peer feedback quality through interaction with educational chatbots
Learners can revise their feedback writing methods at least twice based on chatbot analysis results
Learners can provide specific and actionable feedback on peers' writing with at least 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
